attributes.action: Make a request for the government to scrap a basic £200 energy loan for all.
attributes.additional_details: All individuals should have the right to manage their own finances, and level of debt. These loans should not be imposed upon individuals and households without the ability to opt-in/opt-out.
attributes.background: I/we propose the government scrap the implementation of a blanket £200 energy loan for all customers, and allow for individual customer choice to apply/receive this where financial assistance is needed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608007
